scripts.e2e:note: YOU MUST BUILD bridge-src-tauri BEFORE invoking the below e2e test. YOU MUST START the backend in the tests folder as well.
scripts.e2e: export SP2ANY_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080 && export SP2ANY_DATA_DIR="$(realpath "$PWD/../test/tmp")" && rm -rv "$SP2ANY_DATA_DIR"; wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
